This is a large task and probably not very high-priority. Our initial performance focus is more on finding the appropriate abstractions rather than micro-optimizations, except in a few critical places.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1798?focusedCommentId=17285911) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I don't think it's worse keeping a generic issue open for this. Interested parties will contribute optimizations when they need them.
